[ti:Lean Wit Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Goodbye & Good Riddance (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lean Wit Me (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:12.05]Drugs got me sweatin' but the room gettin' colder
[00:14.73]Lookin' at the devil and the angel on my shoulder
[00:17.61]Will I die tonight I don't know is it over
[00:20.70]Lookin' for my next high I'm lookin' for closure
[00:23.59]Lean with me pop with me
[00:25.78]
[00:26.55]Get high with me if you rock with me
[00:28.72]
[00:29.40]Smoke with me drink with me
[00:31.81]

[00:40.40]

[00:55.73]Shorty tell me I should really sober up
[00:58.13]
[00:58.67]This sh*t ain't fiction it's too real too real

[01:04.72]I'm lookin' for trouble so I know I'm gonna find it
